LanguageData.allowLabel_Text: These setting change which things can be requested by beggars. Beggar quests don't pull from the whole list, so removing default things may result in quests being unavailable.
LanguageData.BeggarRequestValueMultiplier_Tooltip: This multiplier will affect the value of things that beggars request during beggar quests, as a multiplier on colony wealth. For example, if set to 0.4 beggars will request roughly half of what they would in vanilla as the vanilla multiplier is 0.85.
